trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Hilmar is offering good coin for a seemingly simple task.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_TODO_00<tab>Fill the mining lamps with pungent lamp oil.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_001<tab>I'm offering coin to anyone willing to fill up the lamps. Interested?
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_002<tab>There are four of them. Here's the oil. Come and see me when you're done.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_010<tab>I'd like it done now, if you don't mind.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_020<tab>Finally finished, then. Gnomes didn't get in your way, did they?
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_021<tab>There seem to be more and more of them these days. Makes even filling the lamps a pain in the arse.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_022<tab>Still, can't let them stop us from doing our jobs. Just another occupational hazard.
TEXT_LUCKZH002_03512_HILMAR_000_023<tab>Anyway, here's your pay. Good work, sinner.
